name: The Spirit Glass (JackrabbitGames)
description:
You're trapped in an abandoned mansion, ghosts, creepy crawlies, there's nothing you can do, but fight. Crawl through this dungeon crawling experience, find the key to your freedom. Lore pray tell the magic mirror you discovered might help you along the way.

THIS GAME IS BY FAR NOT FINISHED, it's more of a working concept that we'd like to continue fleshing out, but for now we provide just a taste of what is to come!
